title: Easy Slow Cooker Swiss Steak
directions: Spread beef stew meat into the bottom of a slow cooker. Pour steak sauce over the beef; top with onion and tomatoes.
Cook on Low for 9 to 10 hours.
Whisk flour into water in a small bowl; stir into liquid in slow cooker. Continue cooking until the liquid thickens, 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: 2 pounds beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch pieces
